text:
በኮሮና ቫይረስ (COVID-19) ተይዣለሁ?


ትኩሳት        ሳል           የትፋሽ ማጠር

elements.text:
በኮሮና ቫይረስ (COVID-19) ተይዣለሁ?


ትኩሳት        ሳል           የትፋሽ ማጠር

text:
#2 የኮረና ቫይረስ ( COVID 19) ምልክቶች

*ትኩሳት        
*ሳል           
*የትፋሽ ማጠር

ምልክቶቹ ለቫይረሱ ከተጋለጡ በሗላ ከ 2-14 ቀናቶች ሳይታዩ ይቆያሉ::

ለቫይረሱ ተጋልጫለሁ የሚል ስጋት ካደረቦት እና ትኩሳት ወይም ሌሎች ምልክቶች ካሎት በቀጥታ የጤና ባለሙያዎችን ያነጋግሩ::

elements.text: #2 የኮረና ቫይረስ ( COVID 19) ምልክቶች

*ትኩሳት        
*ሳል           
*የትፋሽ ማጠር

ምልክቶቹ ለቫይረሱ ከተጋለጡ በሗላ ከ 2-14 ቀናቶች ሳይታዩ ይቆያሉ::

ለቫይረሱ ተጋልጫለሁ የሚል ስጋት ካደረቦት እና ትኩሳት ወይም ሌሎች ምልክቶች ካሎት በቀጥታ የጤና ባለሙያዎችን ያነጋግሩ::

text:
1. የኮረና ቫይረስ (COVID-19) ምልክቶች
1. ትኩሳት        
2. ደረቅ ሳል           
3. የሰውነት ድካም
4. አክታ ማመንጨት
5. የትንፋሽ ማጠር
6.የጡንቻ ህመም
7.የጉሮሮ መቁሰል
8.ራስ ምታት
9.ብርድ ብርድ ማለት
10. ማስመለስ/ማስታወክ
12.የአፍንጫ መታፈን/መዘጋት
13.ተቅማጥ
14.ደም የተቀላቀለ ሳል ማሳል
15.በከፍተኛ ሁኔታ የአይን መቅላት ማበጥና እንባ መፍሰስ ናቸዉ

text: Hey <@U01007VTP8A> - great questions.. .due to the urgency of the matter - our motto is speed over perfection. We are trying to do all we can  on all platforms.We are creating a list of influencers on all their respective platforms to share the assets that we are creating. So far, I have seen posters - nothing with audio or video that I know of. I am not sure about the questions in the end about the sign language.

elements.text: Hey

- great questions.. .due to the urgency of the matter - our motto is speed over perfection. We are trying to do all we can  on all platforms.We are creating a list of influencers on all their respective platforms to share the assets that we are creating. So far, I have seen posters - nothing with audio or video that I know of. I am not sure about the questions in the end about the sign language.

text: Also what is the best Amharic keyboard? I am currently using an online one and copy pasting

elements.text: Also what is the best Amharic keyboard? I am currently using an online one and copy pasting

text:
we have a connection issue on the ground, people usually use their mobile for social media and the internet they find in the offices. unless its optimized (so it wont cost them much), we might not be efficient with meeting our target.
sign language is a language by itself, just wanted to know if we are doing that to ask for people or not.

elements.text:
we have a connection issue on the ground, people usually use their mobile for social media and the internet they find in the offices. unless its optimized (so it wont cost them much), we might not be efficient with meeting our target.
sign language is a language by itself, just wanted to know if we are doing that to ask for people or not.

text: <@U01007VTP8A> great point and will definitely try our best to make chunk video to address connectivity issue . The video is about 9 minutes and it covers several topics once I get the translation I'll edit it accordingly. That is the plan. The sign language is a good call out will try to work on it as well. thanks

text: Those of you working in Tigrigna, check out <https://www.geezexperience.com/>. It's my favorite and the best Tigrigna dictionary out there. It works both ways.

attachments.title: Tigrinya Dictionary
attachments.text: Tigrinya / Tigrigna translation from and to English, Deutsch, Nederland, Italiano & Svenska. Also handy to find alternative words in order to better express yourself in Tigrinya, English, Deutsch ...

elements.text: Those of you working in Tigrigna, check out
